text.0: #ASH20 news from @NEJMGroup: Joe Elia interviews Dr. Bhavana Bhatnagar. She reports that African-American patients aged <60 with acute myeloid leukemia have lower 3-year survival compared with whites: 32% vs. 41%. https://t.co/ATjeD0QVPo @BhavanaBhatnag4 https://t.co/DUgJ2cgunS
text.1: #ASH2020 news from @NEJMGroup: Dr. Terry Gernsheimer discusses her team's research on the prophylactic use of tranexamic acid in patients undergoing treatment for hematologic malignancies https://t.co/EMGFfzV5KO https://t.co/zE28upkeF9
text.2: A 62-year-old man with hypercapnic respiratory failure was intubated, and a propofol infusion was initiated. Five days after admission, his urine became green.
text.3: As a resource to the global health care community, the NEJM collection of Covid-19 articles continues to be free. #COVID19 #SARSCoV2
